111.content:
Being a 5 year old and still not being potty trained is a very stressful life. "Brian!" Your mother called as you sat on your potty watching transformers tv series in your room. She came over and sat beside you. "Did you go?" You look between your legs finding it empty. "Nope." You responded.

Your mother sighed. "Well, I was hoping you'd go potty before day care today, but oh well."

Earlier you were whining how you had to pee or else! Your mom rushed you onto the potty, but of course as usual, you didn't go. Your mother didn't know if it was regression of the potty or was mistaken. You did sometimes mistaken yourself of not knowing if you had to poop or pee.

You stood from the potty and crossed your arms as she put the potty away in the closet. "Told you I didn't have to pee." Just as you said this, the sound of liquid hitting the light blue carpet echoed the room. You noticed, as did your mother who just sighed and hung her head. She just let you pee on the carpet, as the second you were put back on the potty, it'd be too late. The yellow strong stream lasted for a bout 2 minutes before spurting out a little bit, that dribbling to an end. Some small droplets fell from the tip of your wee wee, you starred at the dark blue puddle, than sheepishly smiled at your mom. "Oops?"

You got cleaned up and your mother got you to the day care so she can get her day done. She told the caretakers how you already peed today, just not in the potty. Drawing on some paper with crayons, you waved to your mother as she left. She mouthed 'potty', but you rolled your eyes as you continued drawing.

After about half hour it was TV time, the care takers showed the kids Rugrats! All the kids loved the show, as it wasn't on TV anymore and hard to find to watch. You sat in the back with a smile in your pull ups watching episode....

112.content:
You are Andrew Holmes. You're a 13 year-old boy who likes normal stuff, hanging with friends, playing games, etc.

You are hanging out at your family July 4th cookout with your cousins, aunts, uncles, and parents.

How do things go?

Option 1: You make fun of your little girl cousin for not being potty-trained yet. She wishes that you knew how it felt, so she gets your complete bladder and bowel control while you get her unpotty-trained bladder and bowels.

Option 2: Your cousins dare/bet you to wear a diaper for the entire party.

Option 3: Your choice.

choices: Go back to the dinner table
1121.content:
You are sitting at dinner with your 5 year old cousin , Emily,next to you.

You smell something bad and lean over to realize she's wet her pull-up.

"Are you not potty-trained yet?" You say with a giggle to her.

"No..." She says sadly.

You break out in laughter, you don't know why it's just funny.

Emily looks down in shame and closes her eyes and focuses.

"I wish Andrew could see how I feel" she whispered to herself.

Emily's mom comes over and takes her to be changed in the other room.

You snicker as she returns but feel your stomach grumble.

You suddenly feel feces push against your bottom and underwear.

It smushed against your bottom and you feel your crotch grow wet and warn as well.

You turn red in embarrassment when you realize what's happened.

Emily snickers as she smells it and whispers into your aunts ear.

She turns in shock and gets your mothers attention as well.

Soon your mother comes over and sniffs the air.

"Oh dear, let's get you to the bathroom". She says taking your hand.

You pull off your dirty clothes and take a shower.

124.content:
A couple possible main characters, a normal girl and one in a "unique" situation.

1. Lily
Lily is a cute little girl with pale skin, blue eyes, and long light brown hair. She loves wearing both loose clothes like sundresses, and T-Shirt and shorts. She goes to kindergarten where she is quite popular and well-loved. She loves exploring, art, crafts, swimming, and cartoons.
Lily has a lot of accidents, though, and has an especially weak bladder. Her Mom has been trying to get her to make it to the potty but Lily isn't fast enough or gets too caught up playing to make it every time. Lily also still wets the bed every night. Because of this, Mom makes her wear diapers often. Lily doesn't really mind the diapers, and she isn't the only girl in kindergarten that still needs them, some of the other kids have even more accidents than she does.

2. May
May is a cute little girl with short messy black hair, tan skin, and dark almost sorrowful eyes. She is sensitive, passionate, and would do anything for her parents' approval. She likes TV and her toys when she's allowed to have those things.
Unfortunately for May, she doesn't fit in well with her own family. May was the result of her mother cheating on her father, an act that Mommy quickly regretted. Mom sees May as a mistake and Dad actually doesn't like her much and takes great pleasure in tormenting and humiliating poor little May. May is not allowed to have a normal kid's life. She doesn't get to attend kindergarten and is kept home all day. She isn't allowed to wear nice clothes and is kept in just a diaper most of the time. To make matters worse, May is having a very difficult time potty training, and has to keep a potty chair in her room. May also has a big sister named Claire a couple years older than her. Claire, like her father, has light blonde hair and fair skin. Claire doesn't need diapers and is treated like a princess. May looks up to Claire, so she is often humiliated in front of Claire and Claire's friends. Sometimes Claire is sympathetic to little May's problems, and sometimes she points and laughs.

1242.content:
Little May was in her room alone playing with some of her toys. The dark haired little girl was dressed in only a thick diaper, her body mostly bare. She got cold easily, and being nearly naked most of the time didn't help, so there were a couple of blankets around her room as well. A large potty chair shaped like a swan wit handles for her to hang onto was in the corner. The lid was closed, but it smelled of poop. May's life smelled of poop. Her room, even when clean, smelled like poop. May, even when clean, often smelled like poop. Her toys, her blankets, her diapers, her pillows, anything kept around May, before long, would inevitably begin to smell like poop. Worst of all, May's relationship with the rest of her family, smelled like poop.

May was the unfortunate result of her mother cheating on her father. While her Mom, Dad, and older sister Claire all had pale skin and bright blonde hair, May's complexion was an ashy tan color and her hair was smooth and black. May's Mother did love her, a little, but really saw the poor little girl as a mistake, and hated herself more and more if she spent a long time around May. May's father didn't really like her much, and only held a tiny shred of love for her, and only out of obligation. He often went out of his way to humiliate and torment May, taking joy in putting her in bizarre situations and making her cry. Claire was sometimes sympathetic to her little sister May. She would give her hugs and try to make her feel better about being the black sheep of the family, but just as often joined Daddy in mocking and humiliating May.

May went to cuddle with one of her stuffed animals (which all smelt faintly of poop) when the little girl began to uncontrollably mess herself. May awkwardly grimaced as the warm load filled the back of her diaper.
"Oh man..." May groaned.
She dropped her stuffed animal and sighed.
"Another accident." She said, hanging her head in shame.
It was time for her to beg to be cleaned and changed.

May slowly opened the door to her room and stepped out into the hallway. Walking slowly and awkwardly because of her messy diaper, May made her way to the living room where Mom, Dad, and Claire were watching TV. It was some kind of violent show where people drove cars covered in weapons and tried to kill one another. It was one of Dad's favorite shows. The kids were obviously too young to watch it, but Claire got a free pas because she was Daddy's favorite. Oddly, Claire seemed to enjoy it, and, for a little girl, was surprisingly desensitized to violence.

"Well, look who came out of her hole. It's my little poo-poo girl!" Daddy said, smiling like a beast.
May tried to smile back, a gentle cute smile of an innocent little girl. Daddy had noticed her. She tried to be nice and friendly when he noticed her. She dreamed that if she was nice enough to Daddy then one day he might be nice back.
"D... Daddy... I had an accident. Can I please get cleaned up?" May asked.
Daddy scruffed up May's short black hair.
"Well, I guess someone's gotta do it. You really stink." Daddy said, bluntly.
May didn't like being reminded of this. She hung her head in shame. Daddy noticed her response and pushed harder.
"I mean, you always stink a little bit, May, but right now it's extra bad, like the worst you've been in a long time. I could tell the moment you walked in, I thought to myself, 'Wow, what a poopy daughter! She sure does smell like poop!' Damn, you smell!" Daddy said, roasting her like a middle-schooler.
May could feel a know in her throat, like she was ready to cry. Somehow she held on. Daddy patted her shoulder.
"Aw, it's okay, May. Don't be too upset. Not everyone can smell as good as your sister." Daddy said.
Claire's ears lit up.
"Ooh! What do I smell like, Daddy?" Claire asked.
"Sunshine and unicorns, little Princess. Sunshine and unicorns." Daddy said.
Claire squealed with delight. May let out a soft, muffled groan. Mommy was getting tired of this horsing around. She grabbed some wet wipes and a fresh diaper from the closet and started walking toward the rest of the family.

Who changes May's poopy diaper?
1242.title: May

choices: Put May in a new diaper and send her back to her room

12422.content:
Mommy spread out a changing mat near the couch.
"Come on, poopy-girl, let's get you cleaned up." Mommy said.
May obediently laid down on the mat. Mom untaped May's diaper and got to work wiping her up. Claire was distracted by the scent and turned her attention away from the ultra-violence on TV and watched her little sister.
"Wow, May really made a yucky doodie." Claire commented.
Mommy nodded.
"She sure did."
May closed her eyes, feeling rather humiliated now. She could smell it herself and hated how much they were going on about how stinky she was.
"Are you ready, May?" Mom asked, out of nowhere.
"Ready for what?" May replied.
May then felt a strange, uncomfortable feeling. Mommy had wrapped a wet wipe around her finger and was cleaning the inside of her butt. May let out a discomforted groan. She hated it when Mommy and Daddy did this to her. May was pretty sure they did this just because it was so uncomfortable and humiliating. Claire let out a few giggles. She always thought it was funny to see May like this, naked and uncomfortable. Daddy laughed a little too. May tried to hide her face, but it didn't do much.

Mommy soon finished and got May nice and clean.
"All better?" Mommy asked.
May let out another discomforted groan as Mommy removed her finger from her butt and threw away the soiled wet wipes.
"I... I guess..." May moaned.
The tan skinned little girl opened her eyes again and crossed her arms over her chest.
"Is it okay if we try not to do that so much?" Naked little May asked, sitting up a tiny bit so she could look at Mommy better.
"Do what?" Mom asked.
"That... That thing where you clean my butt." May said, hanging her head.
She really didn't like talking about it, much less thinking about it.
"It feels really weird and uncomfortable." May added.
Mommy and Daddy laughed at her. Claire laughed a little bit too.
"Honey, that's just not going to happen. That's how we keep you clean. You don't like it, too bad. You'll just have to learn to control your poops... but we all know that won't happen." Daddy said.
May groaned again. She was feeling rather miserable now.

What do Mommy and Daddy do with May now?
12422.title: Mommy offers to do it

choices: Big sister Claire, sent in to check on her
124222.content:
Mommy scooped up May and carried the naked little girl back to her room.
"How about we put you on the potty for a while, hm?" Mommy said.
May nodded and sighed. It wasn't like she had a choice. Mommy opened the lid on May's swan-shaped potty chair and set her daughter down on it.
"There you go! Now, stay here and try your best. I'm going to go get started on dinner. I'll send someone back to check on you in a bit, all right?" Mommy said.
"Okay..." May said.
Mommy walked out leaving May all alone.

May wasn't really a huge fan of having to use the potty chair. She wanted to use the toilet like a big girl, but Daddy insisted she use the potty chair until she was potty trained. May hung her head and thought about all the things her sister Claire was allowed to have that she wasn't. May thought about the toilet, big girl panties, clothes, TV privileges, her father's approval... She wanted all those things so badly it hurt to think about it.
"Oh... If I'm ever going to get those thing's I'll have to try my best." May said, thinking out loud.
She tinkled a little bit, involuntarily, as said this. She had almost no bladder control, but at least she was on the potty.
"I'm going to make a nice big poopy in the potty and impress my Daddy! It's the only way!" May said to herself.
May began to grunt and push as much has she could, but nothing came out. She'd already emptied her bowels into her diaper some time ago and was already cleaned. Quickly, little May wore herself out trying to poop. It didn't take long to wear her out. She was a weak little girl and had almost no endurance. She gasped and panted, unable push any more.
"Oh... how did this get so hard..." May said, out of breath.
May draped her arms on the handles of the potty's chair atop the swan's head. She rested her head in her arms, her silky black hair falling around her face like a veil. Now she was feeling miserable again, unable to even poop when she wanted to. May let out a hopeless groan.

Then, May heard soft, light footsteps. Who was coming in her room?
124222.title: Put May on the potty chair

choices: May wakes up in the morning, wet

1242221.content:
Claire stepped in, holding a plate of food, a baby bottle full of milk, and a bib.
"Hi, sister! Did you go poopy?" Claire asked.
"...No." May groaned.
"That's okay. Mom sent me in with your dinner." Claire said.
The food was mostly scraps and scrapings, some of it burnt. Of course they wouldn't let a dumb poopy diaper girl like May have the best bits, the good stuff was reserved for Mommy and Daddy.

Claire carefully tied the bib around her naked little sister's neck.
"Hungry?" Claire asked.
"Yeah, I guess." May groaned.
She still felt miserable, but she would admit she was hungry.
Claire took a fork full of scraps and went to try and feed it to May.
"Oh, Claire, I can feed myself." May said.
She reached to pull the fork out of May's hand, but she moved it away.
"No-no-no! Mommy said I could treat you like a baby for playtime. I already ate dinner, so it's playtime now! Now come on and let me feed you like a baby." Claire said.
"I'm not a toy, Claire." May said.
Claire booped May on the forehead with her finger.
"You want to eat dinner or not?" Claire said.
The blonde little girl had an evil smile now. May's tummy rumbled. She knew Claire wouldn't let her eat otherwise and Mommy and Daddy didn't care if she missed a meal. May let out an exasperated groan.
"You're a jerk..." May said.
Claire didn't care and only giggled.

The whole experience was quite humiliating for May, wearing a bib on a potty chair and being fed by her older sister. May was quite a clean eater and didn't make a mess. It went rather smoothly.
"Oh, baby May sure was hungry. You ate the whole thing. Time for your bottle!" Claire said.
She handed May the baby bottle full of milk. May drank it on her own. She didn't know it, but there was drowsy cold medicine in there to make her sleepy. Mommy and Daddy often gave it to May when they didn't feel like dealing with her and just wanted her to go to sleep. May, being a weak little girl with poor tolerance for drugs of any kind, quickly began to feel its effects.
"Oh... Oh, Claire I'm all tired all of a sudden." May said.
"All right, I'll go get Mommy so she can put you to bed." Claire said.
She ran off and came back with Mommy a moment later.

Mommy untied May's cute little bib and inspected the potty.
"Hm, plenty of pee-pee, but you didn't go poo-poo. Well, that's okay, I guess. Let's get you diapered up and ready for bed." Mommy said.
Mommy wiped May down and powdered the tan little girl's diaper area. She then taped up a soft little diaper. May was already having a hard time keeping her eyes open. She lifted up May in her arms and set the little girl down in her bed. Even though she didn't particularly like May, she couldn't resist her cuteness. Mommy couldn't help but stroked her silky black hair and give her a soft kiss on the forehead. May let out a giggle. She didn't get many warm, tender moments like this, so this was special.

Mommy took May's blankets and began to wrap the little girl up like a burrito. May actually loved this, it made her feel so warm and comfy. Mommy took special care to make it as tight as possible, so May couldn't move her arms or legs. It didn't matter if she couldn't get up to use the bathroom, she was wearing a diaper anyway.
"Goodnight, poopy girl." Mommy said, smiling.
"Goodnight, Mommy, Goodnight, Claire." May said.
Quickly, May fell asleep.
1242221.title: Big sister Claire, sent in to check on her

1243.content:
Here's an idea, how about a large slumber party with kids of various ages involved? Their parents are all friends and are helping them get together. The party is generally divided among the younger kids, who all need diapers, and the older kids, who, while the grown-ups are talking and watching TV downstairs, look after the younger ones.

Shanna woke up a short time later, feeling refreshed. Even though she had only slept for a little more than twenty minutes, all the misadventures and spankings and trouble felt like it happened yesterday. She felt happy and free. Smiling, little Shanna sat up and soon discovered... that she had messed and wet herself in her sleep. A familiar warm squishy feeling could be felt inside her diaper. 1431321.content:
Bryan strode his way to school, looking quite confident as always. He was a robust five-year old bull with a full figure, sporting very small spikes that almost counted as horns. He walked his striped shirt through the hallways, throwing his backpack down and sitting down before adjusting his cargo pants. The other kindergarteners greeted him as they began to talk and enjoy their day. Bryan was sure to keep glancing down at his waist, one wrong move and all the work he'd put into hiding his diaper would go to waste. He hoped he wasn't leaning forward too much or stretching too much, accidentally allowing the fluffy rim of the diaper overtaking his shorts.

Bryan pulled his shirt down with his hooves. "Hey guys, what do you wanna do today?" He asked as the others chimed in. "We're playin' games!" One of the other children said, everyone beginning to cheer. They had a mostly free day, the teacher talking and addressing a few things, doing a few play lessons, but most of the day, the children just played games. Bryan was doing well, he got through the morning and lunch, as well as recess without a problem. Soon it would be the end of the school day, and the children were getting awfully wound up staying inside most of the day. Bryan wanted to try to join them, but felt ever so reluctant, unable to be sure why.

The children exited the school, everyone going home rather early today. The teachers had locked the doors once everyone had gone home. Bryan walked down the orange street bathed in sunlight, talking with the other children, suddenly realize as he walked along that his diaper area was beginning to feel a bit tense. That was it! It was poo poo, and he had to go pretty bad. Bryan was always good with holding back number one, he often flooded his diapers in the privacy of his own home. But once he had to go number two, it was only a matter of time until Bryan would be walking around in a full diaper. He talked to the other kids, trying to take his mind off it. "Heheh...Um, wanna just go home? I am a little tired." He said, but the other children refused and wanted to play some more. There was the issue of his number two need, but now would be a bad time to excuse himself.
1431321.title: Bryan the Bull

Bryan pulled up his big boy pants and decided to tough it out. He simply pressed his butt cheeks together harder as he walked, hoping he could hold off pooping in his diaper. He walked with the other kids about as normally as they did, and talked and joked about the same way. They headed into a nearby park with a few other children already playing, some of the older ones in the basketball courts, chattering off in the distance. Bryan wobbled to and fro as he tried thinking of happier thoughts, but only able to think about how much he had to go number two. "Um, what do you guys wanna do now?" He asked the other kids, sitting down and crossing his legs.

One of the other children pointed out there was a carousel at this playground and that they should all go ride on it. Bryan got up a bit slowly as he pressed between his cheeks for a few seconds, following the other children. His tummy began to feel light and swooshy as he sat on the cartoons, the others beginning to push the remainder on the carousel. Bryan tried to enjoy the ride as best as he could, but felt a funny feeling in his stomach the whole time, wondering if he'd be able to finish riding with an empty diaper. The ride finally stopped, Bryan sliding off carefully so as not to upset himself. He pushed weakly for the other children as he slowly paused, stopped and walked away for a minute.

The other kids slowly stopped on the carousel and asked where Bryan was going. Bryan was just walking around, trying to hold it even more, but the feeling was getting really strong, and his bottom was starting to give out. He turned around and sighed. "Nothing!" He said, beginning to pant a bit. The other kids began to gather and ask what was going on as Bryan bent his legs a few times without thinking and began looking at all of his friends. It was definitely time to go, Bryan resting on his haunches, looking to his friends.

You are an anthro dragon child named Temera, and as such, you have an appearance similar to that of a regular 5 year old girl, save for the red scales covering your body and the tiny undeveloped horns, wings and tail barely sticking out of you body. You have dark red hair which isn't particularly rare for a red dragon, though your specie as a whole is, in fact rare.

You have just arrived to your new classroom in your new anthro-only school. Last year your parents have sent you to a regular, mixed human-anthro school, and while the results could've been worse - you have been subjected to some bullying, partly due to your specie's rarity in urban cities. Now you're hoping your new anthro classmates will be more understanding and be less afraid of you.

As the teacher that is a female fox anthro introduced you to your new class in front of your new classmates which are currently
eyeing you with wonder and amazement, you are reminded of another reason why you were bullied - you were still in diapers.

As the nervousness from the crowd of eyes watching you makes you pee and soak your diaper, you start to remember the reason why
you were never potty-trained: Simply put - your parents were never around, always off on their own jobs and generally expected you to take care of yourself since, as a dragon, you are very powerful even as a child and couldn't be kidnapped. As a result they never had time to potty-train you and probably won't do it for years to come.

Luckily, the introductions ended soon after and while you didn't want to wet your diaper, at least it's not as noticeable as a messy diaper. You go to your seat, hoping your accident isn't noticeable and say hey to the kid that's sitting next to you:

The rest of the time after the introductions was spent teaching the students the rules of the school, meanwhile you were both looking around, hoping the other kids aren't staring at you and also looking at your desk mate who is staring down shyly after your eyes met, which you find kind of cute and relatable.

After that, the break started. You take out your breakfast which is just a regular sandwich with more meat in it than any human breakfast sandwich should have, and before you unwrap it, the eagle kid sitting next to you surprisingly turn to you and says: "Hi! I'm David. What's your name?"

However, David seem strangely surprised and lower his head in response to your greeting, shyly, as if to avoid your gaze.

You don't understand why David seem to change his attitude towards you, but you think he IS trying to be friendly, so you try and start the conversation again: "Are you new to this school, too?" you ask, and David replies without lifting his head too much: "No, I..." and after a pause adds "I been in this school for 2 years already;"

David doesn't add anything else but he does try to make eye contact with you more. But just as you try and smile towards him, he quickly take a small look over your entire body and retreats to looking at his desk.

Now you understand, David probably have never seen a dragon before. He must be scared of what you can do to him. You must change that as soon as possible, you think to yourself.

"Don't worry," you say "I'm not gonna hurt you." David takes a peak at you carefully, uttering: "I..." Clearly - he's still not convinced.
You then look around and see that the other students are looking at you carefully, seems like this might be just like the last school.

But you aren't willing to give up and ask David: "Hey, w-wanna see something cool?"
David looks at you to see you spitting from your mouth a small ball of fire upwards that disappears right after. As he looks down back at you, you give him the biggest smile with your sharp teeth and say: "Isn't that cool?!"

At that moment, David couldn't help but smile back, however slightly, as though some kind of barrier was shattered between you two, and say: "Y-yeh!"

Suddenly, a student behind you, a male cat anthro, says excitedly: "Wow. What else you can do?" And before you know it, a crowd of students gather around you excitedly, asking you questions.

Seems like this might be your school after all.

The kids here seem to be fine with your unique species now, you wouldn't want to risk giving them another reason to dislike you.

The surrounding anthropomorphic students seem disappointed but understanding and they stop troubling you and get back to their seats. As you sink your sharp teeth at your nearly forgotten, very meaty sandwich and easily rip it apart and devour it, you see David looking at you from the corner of your eye. When you look at him, though, his gaze doesn't bounce back to the table as it did before, and he keeps looking at you.

"What?" you ask him casually, and he responds hesitantly: "So... Nevermind, I'll let you finish eating."

After a moment of semi-quiet eating, a small belch escapes you and you excuse yourself. Afterwards you ask: "David, what did you want?" The anthropomorphic eagle blushes and begins to ask again hesitantly: "How does it feel to breath fire?" to which you reply: "You too?" with a smile and add: "Alright, I'll tell you, but only if we become friends first!" and David happily agrees.

For the rest of the break, you tell David about how you generate heat from within your chest, how breathing fire feels hot but not painfully so and how much more fire older dragons can spew all at once. Meanwhile you start to notice how the other students seem to huddle around you as if they're listening to a campfire story, but you continue to answer David's questions nontheless.

The bell rings...
143212112.title: Not a fan of crowds.
